history.proof: intros a b c H1 H2. qauto use: Nat.add_sub_assoc, Nat.sub_add.

original: intros a b c H1 H2. rewrite Nat.sub_add_distr. rewrite Nat.sub_add_distr. rewrite Nat.add_comm. rewrite (Nat.add_comm a (-c)). rewrite (Nat.add_comm a (-b)). rewrite <- Nat.add_assoc. rewrite (Nat.add_comm (-b) a). rewrite Nat.add_assoc. rewrite (Nat.add_comm a b). rewrite <- (Nat.add_assoc c b). rewrite (Nat.add_comm b c). rewrite (Nat.add_comm a (-c)). rewrite minus_minus_simpl4; auto.
